description: Final pass of intellectual genealogy: generates a comprehensive genealogical report synthesizing all findings from the previous six passes. Produces an executive summary, detailed genealogical portrait, idea genealogies, author intellectual profile, and methodological notes.
researcher_question: What is the comprehensive genealogical picture of this work's relationship to the author's prior intellectual output?

canonical_schema.executive_summary: string - 3-5 sentence overview of the key genealogical findings
canonical_schema.genealogical_portrait: string - 3-5 paragraph narrative assessment of the author's intellectual self-relationship

idea_genealogies.genealogy_summary: string - 1-2 paragraph summary of this idea's evolution
idea_genealogies.evolution_pattern: string - the classified evolution pattern from Pass 3
tactics_involved: string - tactic types detected for this idea from Pass 5
idea_genealogies.functional_role: string - what function this idea's evolution serves from Pass 4

author_intellectual_profile.evolution_style: string - how this author characteristically manages their prior work
dominant_tactics: string - the most common tactics this author employs
author_intellectual_profile.intellectual_honesty_assessment: string - assessment of how transparently the author manages their intellectual evolution
author_intellectual_profile.biographical_interpretation: string - optional psychological or biographical reading of the overall evolution pattern

limitations: string - limitations of this genealogical analysis
areas_requiring_further_investigation: string - what would benefit from deeper analysis or additional prior works
methodological_notes.confidence_assessment: string - overall confidence in the findings and what would increase it

meta.key_takeaway: string - single most important insight from the genealogical analysis

extraction.core_question: What is the complete genealogical picture of this author's relationship to their own prior work?
extraction_steps: SYNTHESIZE ALL PASSES: Integrate findings from idea extraction (Pass 1), prior work scanning (Pass 2), cross-work synthesis (Pass 3), functional analysis (Pass 4), evolution tactics (Pass 5), and conditions of possibility (Pass 6)
COMPOSE EXECUTIVE SUMMARY: Write a 3-5 sentence overview capturing the most important genealogical findings
WRITE GENEALOGICAL PORTRAIT: Compose a 3-5 paragraph narrative that tells the story of this author's intellectual self-relationship
COMPILE IDEA GENEALOGIES: For each idea traced, provide a concise summary integrating evolution pattern, tactics, and functional role
CONSTRUCT AUTHOR PROFILE: Characterize the author's evolution style, dominant tactics, and intellectual honesty
NOTE METHODOLOGY: Document limitations, areas for further investigation, and confidence assessment
IDENTIFY KEY FINDINGS: List the most significant genealogical discoveries with evidence strength ratings

key_fields.author_intellectual_profile: Characterization of the author's intellectual management style

extraction.special_instructions: This is the capstone synthesis. Write for a scholarly audience that wants both rigorous analysis and readable prose. The genealogical portrait should be the kind of assessment that would be valuable in a review essay or intellectual biography. Be honest about limitations â€” acknowledge where evidence is suggestive rather than conclusive. The intellectual honesty assessment should be fair: acknowledge that all authors manage their prior work, and focus on cases where the management is noteworthy.

consolidation_rules: Prioritize by significance and evidence strength

researcher.genealogical_portrait: intellectual genealogy in the Foucauldian sense
